SELECT if(personal.userName is not null && personal.userName <> '' ,1,0) personalInfo, if(emergency.userName is not null && emergency.userName <> '' ,1,0) emergencyInfo, if(moremore.userName is not null && moremore.userName <> '',1,0) moreInfo, if(company.userName is not null && company.userName <> '',1,0) companyInfo, if(bankCard.bankId is not null && bankCard.bankId <> '',1,0) cardInfo, if(riskCardit.userName is not null && riskCardit.userName <> '',1,0) riskCarditInfo, if(pay.userName is not null && pay.userName <> '',1,0) payTreasure, if(phone.userName is not null && phone.userName <> '',1,0) phoneInfo, if(personal.maritalStatus is not null && personal.presentPeriod is not null && personal.companyName is not null && personal.workIndustry is not null && personal.companyAddress is not null && personal.maritalStatus <> '' && personal.presentPeriod <> '' && personal.companyName <> '' && personal.workIndustry <> '' && personal.companyAddress <> '' ,1,0) scoreInfo FROM (select u.user_name userName from user_info u where u.id=#{id}) userName LEFT JOIN (select u.user_name userName,u.qq qq,u.email email,u.marital_status maritalStatus,u.present_period presentPeriod,u.company_name companyName,u.company_address companyAddress,u.work_industry workIndustry from user_info u where u.id=#{id} AND u.realname IS NOT null and u.id_number IS NOT null AND u.education!=0 AND u.realname_status=1) personal ON(1=1) LEFT JOIN (select u.user_name userName from user_info u where u.id=#{id} AND u.first_contact_name IS NOT NULL AND u.first_contact_phone IS NOT NULL AND u.second_contact_name IS NOT null AND u.second_contact_phone IS NOT NULL) emergency ON (1=1) LEFT JOIN (select u.user_name userName from user_info u where u.id=#{id} AND u.qq IS NOT NULL AND u.email IS NOT NULL AND u.taobao_account IS NOT null AND u.wechat_account IS NOT NULL) moremore ON(1=1) LEFT JOIN (select u.user_name userName from user_info u where u.id=#{id} AND u.company_address IS NOT null AND u.company_address_distinct IS NOT NULL AND u.company_name IS NOT NULL AND u.company_period IS NOT null AND u.company_phone IS NOT null ) company ON(1=1) LEFT JOIN (select card.bank_id bankId from user_card_info card where card.user_id=#{id} and card.status=1 and card_default=1) bankCard ON(1=1) LEFT JOIN (select u.user_name userName from user_info u where u.id=#{id} AND u.zm_status=2) riskCardit ON(1=1) LEFT JOIN (select u.user_name userName from user_info u where u.id=#{id} AND u.td_status=2) phone ON(1=1) LEFT JOIN (select u.user_name userName from user_info u where u.id=#{id} AND u.my_hb_time IS NOT null) pay ON(1=1)
